original: Fristedt, Karl Sigfrid, landsfiskal, Trollhättan, f. 6/1/97 i Hogrän, Gotl. 1., av pastor Anders Petter F. o. Maria Levander. G. 27 m. Annie Olsson. Barn: Kerstin f. 28, Ingegerd 32, Ragnhild 36. — Realex. i Vimmerby 16, landsfiskalsex. i Vänersb. 23. Kont:bitr. h. landsfisk. i Eksjö 16-17, tj :bitr. h. landsfisk. i Väse distr. 19-2:1, tjg. v. länsstyr. i Karlstad 22-23, v. krim:pol. i Sthlm 23, tf. landsfiskal i Väse 24-27, e. landsfiskal i Värml. 1. m. plac. i Karlstad resp. Arvika distr. 27-31, landsfiskal i Tunhems distr., nu Trollhättans distr. sed. 31. Styriled. i fp lok:avd. sed! 36, ordf. i tax:nd sed. 47, led. av tax:nd f. rörelseidk. m. m., av Trollhätt. idr:- o. friluftsstyr., av civ :försv :nd. Civ :försv :chef i Tunhems civ :försv :omr.
translated: Fristedt, Karl Sigfrid, district prosecutor, Trollhättan, born January 6, 1897 in Hogrän, Gotland. Son of pastor Anders Petter F. and Maria Levander. Married Annie Olsson in 1927. Children: Kerstin born in 1928, Ingegerd born in 1932, Ragnhild born in 1936. Completed secondary school in Vimmerby in 1916. Was assistant to the district prosecutor in Eksjö in 1916-1917, and in Väse district in 1919-1921. Was in the service of the county government in Karlstad in 1922-1923, and of the criminal police in Stockholm in 1923. Was acting district prosecutor in Väse in 1924-1927, and district prosecutor in Värmland from 1927 to 1931, with places in Karlstad and Arvika districts. Has been district prosecutor in Tunhems district, now Trollhättan district, since 1931. Director of the local branch of the Liberal People's Party since 1936, chairman of the tax committee since 1947, member of the tax committee for trade and more, of the Trollhättan sports and outdoor activities committee, and of the civilian defense committee. Is the civilian defense chief in Tunhems civilian defense area.

workExperience.title: In the Service of the County Government
In the Service of the Criminal Police
